original_title: Stereopony Final Live - BEST of STEREOPONY
overview: BEST of STEREOPONY ~Final Live~ is the fourth DVD (second live concert video) released by Stereopony. It features Stereopony's farewell concert held at Akasaka BLITZ on December 27th, 2012. It also contains digest of their first one-man concert at their home ground.
title: Stereopony Final Live - BEST of STEREOPONY
